main event: A green object resembling a shooting star was observed over Johnson Island AFB on December 9, 1957.
interesting points: The object turned brighter green as it descended., It moved at a high speed, but not as fast as a shooting star., Observations were made from the ground., The object was concluded to be possibly a balloon., No photographs were taken during the sighting.
sighted object: one green object resembling a shooting star
location: Johnson Island AFB, Johnson Island, US
witness description: Local military personnel at Johnson Island AFB
